import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import '../../style/Filter.css' import { Link,useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../Common/Header' export default function Filter() { let { MealType } = useParams() const [locations, setLocations] = useState([]) const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1) const [restaurantList, setRestaurantList] = useState([]) const [headingLocation, setheadingLocation] = useState("Delhi") const[filter,setFilter]=useState({ city_id:'', cuisine:[], lcost:'', hcost:'', sort:1 // type: [`${MealType.toLowerCase()}`] }) const[pageCount,setPageCount]=useState(0) const requestOptions={ method:'POST', headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}, body:JSON.stringify(filter) } //call API useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://zomato-44.herokuapp.com/restaurant/filter/${currentPage}`,requestOptions) .then(response=>response.json()) .then(data => { setRestaurantList(data.data) setPageCount(data.totalRecords/2) }) } , [filter,currentPage]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`https://zomato-44.herokuapp.com/location`, { method:'GET' }).then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setLocations(data.data)) },[]) const fetchRestaurants = (e) =>{ filter.city_id = e.target.value console.log(e.target.key) let cityNames = {1:"Delhi",2:"Pune",3:'Bangalore',4:"Chennai",5:"Mumbai",6:"Chandigarh"} setheadingLocation(cityNames[e.target.value]) setFilter({...filter}) } const handleCuisineChange=(e)=>{ console.log(e.target.name) if(e.target.checked) filter.cuisine.push(e.target.name); else { let index = filter.cuisine.indexOf(e.target.name); if(index >-1) filter.cuisine.splice(index,1) } setFilter({...filter}); } const handleCostChange=(lcost,hcost)=>{ filter.lcost=lcost; filter.hcost=hcost; setFilter({...filter}) } const handleSort=(s)=>{ filter.sort=s; setFilter({...filter}) } const paginationItems = []; for(let i=1;i<=pageCount;i++) paginationItems[i] = setCurrentPage(i)}>{i} const locationDropdown = locations.length && locations.map(item => ) console.log(MealType) return (
{MealType} Places in {headingLocation}
Filters
Select Location
Cuisine
handleCuisineChange(e)}/> North Indian
handleCuisineChange(e)} /> South Indian
handleCuisineChange(e)}/> Chineese
handleCuisineChange(e)}/> Fast Food
handleCuisineChange(e)} /> Street Food
Cost For Two
handleCostChange(1,500)} /> Less than ₹ 500
handleCostChange(500,1000)}/> ₹ 500 to ₹ 1000
handleCostChange(1000,1500)} /> ₹ 1000 to ₹ 1500
handleCostChange(1500,2000)} /> ₹ 1500 to ₹ 2000
handleCostChange(2000,10000)} /> ₹ 2000 +
handleCostChange(1,10000)}/> All
Sort
handleSort(1)} /> Price low to high
handleSort(-1)}/> Price high to low
{ restaurantList.length > 0 ? restaurantList.map((item, index)=>
{item.name}
{item.locality}
{item.city_name}
CUISINES : {item.Cuisine.length && item.Cuisine.map((item)=> item.name+' ')}
COST FOR TWO : {item.cost}
):
No Data Found
}
« {paginationItems} »
) }
